titles.title: Strategic Arctic Naval Focus Act of 2019
Strategic Arctic Naval Focus Act of 2019
A bill to state the policy of the United States regarding the need for strategic placement of military assets in the Arctic, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Strategic Arctic Naval Focus Act of 2019
This bill articulates the policy of the United States with respect to the Arctic. Specifically, it shall be the policy of the United States to prioritize Navy and Coast Guard missions, infrastructure and capability development, training, and stationing of assets in the Arctic.
The Department of Defense, in consultation with the Coast Guard, shall submit a report on the development and execution of a strategic plan that focuses on addressing U.S. Arctic policy.
